testcase.name: Verify Search Hotel By Select By All Fields

failure.message:
Step [User Should Perform Login {string},{string}] is defined with 2 parameters at 'com.stepdefinition.TC1_LoginStep.userShouldPerformLogin(java.lang.String,java.lang.String)'. However, the gherkin step has 3 arguments: * "<UserName>" * "<Password>" * Table: | ganesh | kumar |
Step text: User Should Perform Login "<UserName>","<Password>"
